mdRecord.dcterms:title: 166 Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: White, Hawley C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the Washington's tomb at Mount Vernon with several visitors. Mounted on gray board. The publisher's imprint on the front of the cardboard mount reads: The "Perfec" Stereograph. (Trade Mark.) Patented April 14, 1903. Other Patents Pending. H. C. White Co., Publishers. General Office and Works, North Bennington, Vt., U.S.A. Title: 166 Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon, Va. Copyright 1902 by H. C. White Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Tomb
